title: Bhoomi Sutrum Lyrics Naaigal Jaakirathai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Bhoomi Sutrum
Singer(s): Haricharan
Movie: Naaigal Jaakirathai
Music: Dharan Kumar

Oyaadhey oyaadhey
or naalum manmeley
theeraadhey sogangal
oyndhey nee ponaaley.

Boomi suttrum varaye
vaanam vattrum varaye
naamum ingae adhupol
oyve indri vervai sindha

Paadhai sellum varaye
bhaashai sollum varaye
thedal konda maname
thengaamal nee kaattrai mundha

Ottiya vedhanai odidum varayil
pathiyamaai iruppom
Muttidum theemayin moochayum parithu
vettriyum kaipidipom pidipom

Boomi suttrum varaye
vaanam vattrum varaye
naamum ingae adhupol
oyve indri vervai sindha

Paadhai sellum varaye
bhaashai sollum varaye
thedal konda maname
thengaamal nee kaattrai mundha

Oyaadhey oyaadhey
or naalum manmeley
theeraadhey sogangal
oyndhey nee ponaaley.

Mudiyaadhadhe ingum edhuvumillai
mull endru nagarndhaale pagale illai
idithaangavum nenjil valuvulladhey
innalgal emai paarthu bayam kolludhey.

Boomi suttrum varaye
vaanam vattrum varaye
naamum ingae adhupol
oyve indri vervai sindha

Paadhai sellum varaye
bhaashai sollum varaye
thedal konda maname
thengaamal nee kaattrai mundha

Ottiya vedhanai odidum varayil
pathiyamaai iruppom
Muttidum theemayin moochayum parithu
vettriyum kaipidipom pidipom

Boomi suttrum varaye
vaanam vattrum varaye
naamum ingae adhupol
oyve indri vervai sindha

Paadhai sellum varaye
bhaashai sollum varaye
thedal konda maname
thengaamal nee kaattrai mundha

Oyaadhey oyaadhey
or naalum manmeley
theeraadhey sogangal
oyndhey nee ponaaley.
